entry.data:
SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

entry.em: WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND NEW YEARS DAY
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
